meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via videoconference

agenda_items.title: Receive the report of the Ad Hoc City Council Canvassing Committee
agenda_items.description: Adopt a resolution and order accepting the canvassing committee's report declaring the results of the November 5, 2024 special election held within the City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Adoption of a resolution appointing Interim Inspector General
agenda_items.description: Appointment effective at the close of business on November 19, 2024, to serve until the City Council selects and appoints the Inspector General.

keywords: Ad Hoc City Council Canvassing Committee
